anytime:
distant
apart,cold,cool,dispersed,faint
close,near,cordial,friendly,warm
His stepson is still very distant towards him.他的继子对他仍然很疏远。
Her manner was cold and distant.她的态度冷漠而疏远。
It snows all the year round in that distant little village.在那个遥远的小村落里整年下雪。

treat
account,consider,evaluate,rate,think

We should treat people and animals with humanity.我们应该仁慈地对待人和动物。
Do not treat a naughty child rough.不要粗暴地对待顽皮的孩子。
I decided to treat his remark as a joke.我决定把他的话当作戏言。

anywhere
anyplace,wherever,where,somewhere,everywhere

The city welcomes visitors from anywhere.这座城市欢迎来自任何地方的来访客人。
One day they may be able to go anywhere in space.会有那么一天，它们也许能够进入太空的任何地方。

pattern
arrangement,design,device,example,figure

The two buildings are modeled after the same pattern.这两座建筑是按照同一模式建造的。
Training and education follow different patterns in different regions.培训和教育在不同的地区遵循不同的模式。
This cloth has a pattern of blue and white squares.这种布有蓝白格子的图案。

prevail
triumph,predominate,reign,exist,conquer

This old custom does not prevail now.这种旧风俗现在已经不流行了。
Misty weather prevails in this part of the country.该国的这一地区天气多雾。
Virtue will prevail against evil.美德定将战胜邪恶。

occasion
chance,occurrence,time

I only wear a tie on special occasions.我只在特殊场合才打领带。
This is not an occasion for laughter.这不是笑的时候.
There was no occasion for you to be so rude.你没有理由这样粗鲁。

sip
taste,drink,mouthful,nip,swallow

He took one sip of the wine and spat it out.他抿了一口酒，又吐了出来。
He paused to take a sip of water, and then went on with his story.他停下来呷了一口水，然後继续讲他的事。
I sipped at the coffee.我啜饮咖啡。

grape
grapevine,grape,grapeshot

The loser's scorn for the award is pure sour grape.失败者对奖品的轻视纯粹是吃不到葡萄说葡萄酸。
Sour grape can never make sweet wine.酸葡萄酿不出甜酒。
The sun shines through the grape-leaves.太阳从葡萄树叶中穿过。

auditorium
hall,theater,lecture,theatre,amphitheatre

The auditorium seats 3,000 people.这个礼堂可坐三千人。
The stage is thrust forward into the auditorium.舞台向前突出，伸入观众席。
The competition hasn't begun, but you can already hear the hubbub from the auditorium.比赛还没开始，观众席上已经人声鼎沸了。

update
inform,fill,apprise,modernize,revise

The data should be updated once a week.这些数据应该每星期更新一次。
The feedback from the computer enables us to update the program.计算机的反馈能使我们更新程序。
I would advise you to update the software.我建议你把这个软件升级。

drink
have,take

It is harmful to your health to drink too much.过量喝酒对你的身体有害。
It's not good to drink on an empty stomach.空腹喝酒不好。
Let us drink to the health of our father.让我们举杯为父亲祝福。

ask
charge,demand,expect,inquire,question
answer,reply
May I ask a question?我可以问一个问题吗？
I'm calling to ask you about the delivery.我打电话给你,是询问发货的事。
He'll lend you the money if you ask him.如果你请求他的话，他就会把钱借给你。

bracket
support,brace,relate,join,couple

Their incomes are brought into a higher bracket.他们的收入已进入一个较高的等级段。
Put your name in brackets at the top of each page.把你的名字填写在每页上端的括号内。
The worker fixed a bracket on the wall.工人在墙上固定了一个支架。

coincidence
accident,chance
plan,plot,prearrangement
What a coincidence!真是太巧了！
That was a really creepy coincidence.那样的巧合实在太离奇了。
That's the most incredible coincidence I've ever heard of!那是我听说过的最难以置信的巧合！

throw
cast,fling,hurl,pitch,toss

Pick out some good apples from the box, and throw away the rest.把好苹果从盒子里捡出来,剩下的扔了。
The trees threw long shadows across the lawn.树在草坪上都投下长长的影子。
It's your turn to throw the dice.轮到你掷骰子了。

supply
afford,contribute,equip,furnish,give
take,lack
They wrote off for a fresh supply of penicillin.他们发信要求再供应一批青霉素。
Our wood supply proved insufficient.我们的木材供应证明是不够的。
A tight blockade cut Napoleon's supply lines.严密的封锁切断了拿破仑的补给线。

awful
alarming,bad,base,redoubtable,displeasing
beautiful,fine,wonderful,good,likeable
It would be awful if he found out the truth.如果他发现了真相，那就糟了。
I left Harvard with no real awareness of the awful inequities in the world.当我离开哈佛时,我并没真正有意识到这个世界存在着可怕的不平等现象。
He seemed to be very awful while serving the famous actress.他在招待那位著名的女演员时,看上去非常的敬畏。

swamp
marsh,bog,flood,overwhelm,fen

In the swamp we were beset by mosquitoes.我们在沼泽地受到蚊子的围攻。
The heavy rain has turned the small garden into a swamp.大雨使这小花园变成了一块沼泽地。
Walk through the swamp and we can see the hunter's cabin.走过这片湿地就能看到猎人的小屋了。

hedge
barrier,border,fence,guard,protection

They managed to wriggle their way through the thick hedge.他们设法钻过了厚厚的树篱。
There is an opening in the hedge.这篱笆上有个洞。
There is a hedge of spectators along the sidewalk.沿着人行道形成了一道观众障碍。

much
considerably,frequently,greatly,often,many
little
The President's speech provoked much discussion.总统的演说引发了许多议论。
All the furniture in the room had much carving.房间里所有的家具上都有许多雕刻。
My plans are still very much in embryo.我的计划在很大程度上仍在酝酿中。

disgrace
shame,dishonor,discredit,humiliate,scandal
honor
The dirty classrooms are a disgrace to the school.肮脏的教室是学校的耻辱。
Her actions brought disgrace on his family.她的行为给她的家庭带来了耻辱。
You will bring disgrace on yourself by doing this.你这样做会给自己带来耻辱。

chess
cheat,chess,Bromus

My win at chess raised my spirits a little.我赢了这盘国际象棋才打起了一点精神。
I'm not very fond of playing chess.我不太喜欢下棋。
It was the first time I'd won since I'd learnt to play chess.自从我学会下国际象棋以来，这是我第一次赢。

semester
term

His writing has improved greatly in this semester.这学期他的写作有了很大进步。
This semester will be my last one in this university.这个学期将是我在这所大学的最后一学期了。

tape
ribbon,strip,bandage,bind,fasten

I've got all the Beethoven symphonies on tape.我有贝多芬交响乐全部的录音带。
Cassette tape recorders are gradually out of date now.现在,盒式磁带录音机渐渐过时了。
You'd better put some insulating tape on electric wires.你最好给电线裹上绝缘胶布。

blast
explosion

27 school children were injured in the blast.27名学龄儿童在爆炸中受了伤。
A blast of the trumpet gave her a start.突然发出的喇叭声吓了她一跳。
A blast of wind blew my hat off.一阵风吹走了我的帽子。

eloquent
fluent,forceful,telling

He addressed the audience in an eloquent speech.他向听众发表了雄辩的演说。
Eloquent elephants telephoned other eloquent elephants.雄辩的大象打电话给其他雄辩的大象。
Such an eloquent man will easily talk us down.这样一个有口才的人很容易把我们驳得无话说。

velocity
speed,swiftness,quickness,haste,rate

The car was moving at such a velocity!那辆汽车的速度简直太快了！
The velocity of sound in water is more than four times that in air.声音在水中的速度是在空气中的速度的4倍多。
Gazelles can move with astonishing velocity.羚羊跑起来速度惊人。

precedent
preliminary,original,anterior,antecedent,leading
following
This decision creates a dangerous precedent.这个决定开创了一个危险的先例。
My decision does not constitute a precedent.我的决定下不为例。
This intervention in another nation's affairs has set a precedent which we hope other countries will not follow.对别国事物的这种干涉开了一个先例，我们希望其他国家不要模仿。

intuition
perception,insight,feeling,hunch,suspicion

He takes his ground on intuition.他的意见是凭直觉。
She sensed what was wrong by intuition.她凭直觉意识到什么地方出毛病了。
It was said in a flash of intuition.这话是凭一刹那的直觉说出的。

hardware
gear,paraphernalia,appurtenances,equipment,metalware
software
They carried a vast inventory of hardware.他们带着大量的五金器具存货。
My house stands cheek by jowl with a hardware shop.我家紧靠一家五金商店。
I know nothing about computer hardware.我对计算机硬件一窍不通。

propaganda
publicity,information,advertising,disinformation,indoctrination

Art may be used as a vehicle for propaganda.艺术可用作宣传工具。
There has been a lot of anti-war propaganda.一直有许多反战宣传。
She even helped us do propaganda among the women.她甚至还帮助我们在妇女中间做宣传工作。

eventually
at,finally

It was a long journey, but we eventually arrived.旅程很长，但我们最后还是到达了。
He struggled with his assailants and eventually drove them off.他同攻击他的人进行搏斗，最后把他们赶走了。
She eventually got back the book she had lent him.她终于收回了借给他的书。

learn
acquire,gain,master,study
unlearn,teach
Write out this word ten times so that you learn how to spell it.把这个字抄写十遍就能记住怎麽拼写了。
It's more useful to learn modern languages, such as English and German, than Latin.学习英语和德语等现代语言比学习拉丁语更为有用。
I'm trying to learn English.我正在尽力学英语。

scatter
disperse,strew,spread,distribute,dispel
gather
She wanted us to scatter her ashes to the winds.她希望我们把她的骨灰散播到风中。
The farmers were scattering seed on the fields.农夫把种子撒在田里。
Let's try not to scatter food or drink on the table.别把饭或汤撒到桌上。

queer
strange,peculiar,curious,eccentric,unusual

There is something queer about him.他有些古怪。
Her queer way of dressing attracted the attention of the passerby.她古怪的着装方式引起了过路人的注意。
I have a queer dream last night.我昨晚做了一个奇怪的梦。

layer
coat

This layer of rock contains a lot of flint.这一岩层中有大量燧石。
There is a fine layer of dust on the desk.桌子上有一层薄薄的尘土。
There are several layers of meaning.有几层不同的含意。

optional
voluntary,elective,discretionary,possible,free
obligatory,compulsory
The insurance cover is optional.保险范围可以随意选择。
It is optional with you.那是你的自由。
The goods are optional, but only one.这些物品是可以任选的, 但只能选一个。

depress
sadden,dishearten,lower,discourage,reduce
elate,inspire,encourage
He was depressed by his defeat.失败让他沮丧。
The thought of having to take the exam again depressed me.想到还需重新考试，我就感到沮丧。
The rainy days always depress me.雨天总是使我沮丧。

resign
quit,abdicate,surrender,step,relinquish

Have you heard of her intention to resign?你听到她打算辞职的传闻了吗？
He decided to resign his claim to the copyright.他决定放弃对版权的要求。
He has resigned himself to the fact that he will lose the job.他已经接受他将要失去这份工作的现实。

finance
banking,money,pay

He is a well-known expert in finance.他是知名的金融专家。
The Chancellor of the Exchequer is the minister in charge of finance in Britain.英国财政大臣是负责财政的大臣。
Unless we can get more finance, we'll have to close the store.除非我们能得到更多的资金，我们将不得不关闭这家商店。

editorial
writing,essay,commentary,article,column

The editorial lashed out at official corruption.那篇社论猛烈抨击官场的腐败。
He recomposed the editorial till dawn.他改写社论直到天亮。
She has editorial control over what is included.她有权决定编辑的内容。

direct
advise,aim,case,charge,guide
crooked,indirect,dishonest,untruthful
I' m in direct contact with the hijackers.我与劫机者保持着直接的联系.
Keep product away from direct sunlight and store in a dry cool place.置放在不受阳光直射,干燥通风的地方。
He is very direct, so you always know what his real views are.他为人很直率, 所以你总能知道他的真实想法。

flat
even,horizontal,level,low,plane
crooked,tortuous
Most of our county is as flat as a pancake.我们县大部分地方非常平坦。
In flat open country there is plenty of grass for the cattle to feed on.在开阔平坦的地区有大量的青草供牛群食用。
People used to think that the earth was flat.过去人们认为地球是扁平的。

reveal
divulge,disclose,expose,show,bare
conceal
Several withered trees on the sides of the road reveal the desolation here.道路两旁的几棵枯木显示出这里的荒凉。
His deed revealed him to be a kind man.他的行为显示他是个好心的人。
The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身分。

angle
corner,viewpoint,aim,be

The rising sun is especially beautiful to look at from this angle.旭日从这个角度看起来特别美。
Try looking at the affair from a different angle.试从不同的角度来看这件事。
The two roads lie at an angle of about 45 degrees.这两条路交叉成45度角。

key
answer,clue,code,explanation,guide

He is striking the key of his typewrite.他敲打着打字机的字键。
To exit from this page, press the return key.退出本页面按返回键。
The key here is to set up a responsibility system.关键是建立责任制。

bend
bow,curve,kneel,stoop,deflect
straighten
The branches bent in the wind.树枝被风吹弯了。
The branch bent but didn't break when the boy climbed along it.那男孩爬上树枝时，树枝弯曲了，但是没有折断。
They refused to bend to the hijackers' demands.他们拒绝屈从于劫机者的要求。

duration
period,time,length,term,continuance

The duration of the movie is 110 minutes.这部电影的持续时间是110分钟。
He finished the work of three years' duration.他用三年的时间完成了这项工作。
The duration of marriage is related most obviously to the expectation of life.很明显，婚姻生活的持续时间与人的预期寿命有关。

machinery
machine

We use tractors to pull farm machinery.我们使用拖拉机牵引农业机械。
There was a ceaseless noise of machinery.机器不停地发出噪音。
Some of the machinery is still standing idle.有些机械仍然闲置着。

easy
effortless,ready,simple,smooth,comfortable
difficult,strenuous
It's not easy to rid oneself of a habit.要改掉一个习惯是不容易的。
Her movements were easy and graceful.她的动作轻松而优雅。
It was not easy for me to get the rusty nail out.我好不容易才拔出这颗生锈的钉子。

restrict
confine,limit,prevent,restrain,suppress
derestrict
In a move to restrict imports, the government raised custom duties.政府在限制进口的措施中提高了关税。
Recent laws have tended to restrict the freedom of the press.新法例有限制新闻自由的趋势。
I restrict myself to smoking two cigarettes a day.我限定自己每天只抽两支烟。

disappear
fade,vanish
appear,emerge
The sun disappeared behind a cloud.太阳消失在一片云后面。
Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the severe pollution.因为污染严重，许多美丽的鱼类正在面临绝种。
My wallet has disappeared from the table.我放在桌子上的钱包不见了。

operator
worker,operative,machinist,hand,pilot

I am a computer operator.我是一名计算机操作人员。
Is this man a teaccher or an operator?这个男人是老师还是名操作员?
The lathe is being adjusted by the operator.这台车床正由技工在调准。

blush
flush,colour,redden,color,go

Her blush witnessed her agitation.她脸红表示了她的激动。
She turn away to hide her blush.她扭过脸，怕人见她脸红。
That story might raise a blush on a young girl's cheeks .那个故事可能使少女听了脸红。

resemble
look,bear,take,bring,correspond

The brothers resemble each other in taste.那对兄弟兴趣相似。
She resembles her sister in appearance but not in character.她和她姐姐外貌相似，但性格不同。
You resemble your mother very closely.你非常像你的母亲。

jeans
slacks,trousers,pants,overalls,shorts

Every other girl except me is wearing jeans.除了我以外，其他姑娘都穿著牛仔裤。
He wears an oily old pair of jeans.他穿着一条沾满油污的旧牛仔裤。
Both my sister and I like to wear jeans.我姐姐和我都喜欢穿牛仔裤。

salute
greeting,welcome

We salute the flag everyday at school.我们在学校每天向国旗行礼。
This ignoramus failed to salute me.这个蠢汉看见我不行礼。
They saluted each other by raising their hats.他们举起帽子互相致意。

authority
accepted,administration,government
servility,masses,weakness
The government is the highest authority in the country.政府是国家的最高权力机构。
Authorities say the fires do look suspicious.官方表示，火灾看起来确实很奇怪。
Both the authorities and the media wondered whether insider dealing had been going on.官方跟媒体都在怀疑这里面是不是存在内幕交易。

classic
definitive,standard,model,standard
second-rate
War and Peace is a literary classic.《战争与和平》是一部经典文学著作。
The idea of a classic is historically bound up with the view.从历史上来看，古典的想法和这个观点有着密切的联系。
This is a really classic French champagne.这确实是上等的法国香槟酒。

pamphlet
leaflet,brochure,booklet,folder,tract

He gave me a pamphlet for my call numbers.他给了我一个小册子记录电话号码。
The pamphlet was written to his party.这本小册子是特地为他的政党所写的。

influence
effect,affect,control

Don't let me influence your decision.不要让我影响你的决定。
The labour enthusiasm of the workers strongly influenced us.工人们的劳动热情极大地感染了我们。
He makes a nice drink for women by influencing orange juice.他在橘子汁里加了少量烈性酒即制成了适于女性的爽口饮料。

whip
beat,defeat,lash,snatch

The whip swished through the air.鞭子嗖地一声在空中挥动。
He cracked his whip and the horses began to trot.他噼噼啪啪地挥鞭策马狂跑。
The cruel master beat his slaves with a whip.残酷的主人鞭打他的奴隶。

proposal
motion,offer,proposition

She had had many proposals but preferred to remain single.许多人向她求过婚, 但她愿过独身生活。
The manager made a proposal for uniting the two companies.经理提出了将两家公司联合起来的建议。
Various proposals were put forward by the employees for increasing sales.员工们摆出了各种提高销售额的提议。

trigger
start,activate,set,spark,fire

Price increases will trigger off demands for wage increases.价格上涨会激发人们增长工资的要求。
The odour of food may trigger people's appetite.食物的香味能引起人的食欲。
A detonator is used to trigger an explosive device.雷管用来引爆爆炸装置。

masterpiece
classic,masterwork

The critics hailed his work as a masterpiece.评论家们认定他的作品为杰作。
Do you think it was a masterpiece?你认为这是杰作吗？

rough
coarse,rigorous,irregular,violent,uneven
smooth,refined
The rough road made the car vibrate.崎岖不平的道路使车颠簸得很厉害。
You'd better give us a rough idea of your price.您最好给我们一个粗略的价格。
It is only a rough guide to ideal weight.这只是一个实现理想体重的粗略的办法。

everything
all,the,be-all,entirety,be-all
nothing
Thank you for everything.感谢你做的一切。
Money isn't everything.金钱不是一切。
His standard for everything is excellence.他对所有事物的标准是卓越。

lane
path,avenue,road,pass,channel

The lane is the boundary of our land from theirs.那条小路就是我们这片地与他们那片地的分界线。
She drives carefully up the rocky lane.她驾车小心地从这条很多石头的小路上驶过去。
That lane will take you to his house.你从那条小巷就可以走到他家。

drastic
dreadful,extreme,radical

His view brings a drastic argument.他的观点引起激烈的争论。
Drastic measures were taken to combat inflation.已采取激烈措施对付通货膨胀。
Talk to me before you do anything drastic.你采取任何重大行动之前要跟我谈谈。

fabricate
build,form

The defense accused police of fabricating evidence.被告指责警察编造证据。
The story was fabricated and completely untrue.这故事是捏造的，一点不真实。
It is not easy to fabricate DNA evidence.要假造染色体为证是不容易的。

dominant
chief,influential,main,powerful
recessive,subordinate
Peace was the dominant theme of the conference.和平是大会的首要议题。
He is a dominant leader in our university.他是我们学校最主要的一位领导。
The right hand is dominant in most people.大多数人的右手是优势手。

hysterical
uncontrollable,frantic,frenzied,upset,delirious

Janet became hysterical and began screaming.珍妮特变得歇斯底里，开始尖叫。
His hysterical laughter made everybody stunned.他那歇斯底里的笑声使所有的人不知所措。
He is hysterical at the sight of the photo.他一看到那张照片就异常激动。

recorder
registrar,historian,secretary,marker,scorekeeper

honest
earnest,frank,just,moral,sincere
devious,dishonest,dishonourable,untruthful
Her action declared her to be an honest woman.她的行为足以说明她是一个诚实的女人。
It was commonly believed that he was an honest man.一般都认为他是一个诚实的人。
The article is an attempt to defame an honest man.这篇文章旨在诋毁一个正直的人。

anticipate
expect,foresee,await,antedate,forestall

We anticipate that we will meet a certain amount of resistance to our plan.我们预料我们的计划会遇到一些人的反对。
I anticipate reading the book with great interest.我以极大的兴趣期待着读这本书。
It is unwise to anticipate your earnings by spending a lot of money.大量花钱提前使用自己的收入是不明智的。

liberal
broad,generous,kind,tolerant
conservative,dogmatic,compulsory
They are liberal in their help.他们慷慨相助。
She is liberal with her money.她用钱大方。
Her parents are very liberal and allow her a lot of freedom.她的父母很开明，让她享有许多的自由。

expertise
skill,knowledge,science,equipment,know-how

He has the expertise in the management of hotels.他有酒店管理知识。
I have no sewing expertise我没有缝纫方面的知识。
We were amazed at his expertise on the ski slopes.他斜坡滑雪的技能使我们赞叹不已。

group
assembly,collection,crowd,gather,mass

She has a very wide group of friends.她有一大群朋友。
A group of boys dashed out of the classroom.一群男孩子从教室里冲出来。
That group harmonizes well.那一组用和声演唱得很出色。

capitalism
laissez-faire,dog-eat-dog,commercialism,mercantilism,free
communism,socialism
Capitalism is based on private ownership.资本主义是建立在私有制基础上的。
The essence of his argument is that capitalism cannot succeed.他的论点的核心是资本主义不能成功。

shift
change,move,transfer,switch,alternation

The tools shift around in the car boot every time we turn a corner.我们每次转弯，汽车行李箱里的工具就来回动。
The Left is shifting their ground.左派正在改变立场。
You have to shift as you drive around the corner.你拐角时要换挡变速。

spy
spot,snoop,detect,sight,nose

The spy was expelled from the realm.这名间谍被驱逐出境。
This evidence reinforces my view that he is a spy.这个证据证实了我认为他是间谍的这一看法。
The scout was sent to spy out the land.侦探被派出去秘密侦察高地去了。

composition
work,constitution,writing,combination,document

We examined the rock to find out its composition.我们检验了这一石块,想弄清它的构成成分。
He played many of his compositions for me.他为我演奏了他的许多乐曲。
`Swan Lake' is one of Tchaikovsky's best-known compositions.《天鹅湖》是柴可夫斯基最著名的作品之一。

quote
cite,mention,refer

She asked the reporter not to quote her remarks.她要求记者不要引述她的话。
Please quote your price in terms of pound.请您报盘时用英镑报价。
Can you quote me a recent instance?你能给我举一个最近的例子吗？

admission
admittance,entrance,charge
denial,negation,rejection
He is a coward by his own admission.他自己承认是个胆小鬼。
He was, on his own admission, impulsive by nature.他承认自己生性易于感情冲动。
Do they charge for admission?入场要收费吗?

crowd
flock,host,pack,swarm,throng

We had to push our way through the crowd.我们得从人群中挤过去。
From across the fields came cheers of the crowd.从田野的那一边传来群众的欢呼声。
A large crowd was waiting at the bus stop.一大群人在公共汽车站等候。

initial
first,original,primary
eventual,final
This is a letter paper personalized with his initials.这是一张有他姓名首字母的信纸。
After the initial cheers,the noise of the crowd began to die away as the group started playing.开始的欢呼声结束以后，乐队开始演奏，人们的喧闹声也随之逐渐消失。
We are through the initial testing period.我们通过了最初的考试阶段

distress
trouble,worry
please,satisfy
I pray that you will have pity on my distress.我请求你可怜可怜我的不幸遭遇。
I gripe more from habit than from genuine distress.我抱怨是出于我的习惯，并非遭遇真正的不幸。
They sent a distress rocket.他们发出了一枚呼救信号火箭。

regulation
decree,dictate

We need the regulation of share prices.我们需要对股票价格的管制。
From now on any violation of the regulation must be cruelly punished.今后任何违反秩序的行为会受到严厉惩罚。
It's wrong of you to get around the regulation.你存心规避规章制度是不对的。

postcard
card,picture,message,note,letter

He sent me a postcard from the United Nations.他从联合国给我寄来一张明信片。
Excuse me, how much is a postcard to France?打扰一下，寄往法国的明信片多少钱一张？

thirsty
burning,desirous,dry,thirsting
hungry
He was thirsty for power.他渴望拥有权力。
The thirsty man craved for water.那个囗渴的人渴喝水。
Young man should be thirsty for knowledge.青年人应该渴望知识。

frank
direct,honest,open,sincere
dishonest,tricky
A frank discussion can help to clear the air.坦率的谈论有助于消除疑虑。
To be very frank, I think you have very little chance of getting the job.坦白地说，我认为你获得这项工作的机会微乎其微。
He was frank, open and aboveboard.他胸怀坦白，光明磊落。

physician
doctor,medic,surgeon,doctor,general
surgeon
He was attended by his personal physician.他的私人医生护理他。
He prefers to be a surgeon rather than a physician.他喜欢当外科医生而不愿作内科医生。
The physician put him on a special diet.内科医生给他吃特定的食物。

envelope
covering,packet,cover,wrapper,wrapping

There are several enclosures in the envelope.信封内装有几份附件。
I use a prepaid envelope.我用了一个邮资已付的信封。
He glued a stamp onto the envelope.他把邮票贴在信封上。

fry
cook,saute,brown,deep-fry,tiddler

The eggs are frying in the pan.鸡蛋正在平底锅里煎着。
We cut it into thin slices and fry it.我们把它切成薄片并用油煎。
Shall I fry the fish for dinner?晚饭要不要我炸鱼？

failure
bankruptcy,breakdown,disappointment,fiasco,crash
success
I shall have another chance in the event of failure.如果失败，我还有另一个机会。
The play was a dead failure.这场戏完全失败了。
I was a failure in my own eyes.在我眼里,我是个失败者。

melody
tune,song,air,strain,phrase

The melody still rang in her ears.那个旋律仍然在她的耳际荡。
The organist played a famous melody.这位管风琴手演奏了一首著名的曲子。
He played a delightful melody on his flute.他用笛子吹奏了欢快的曲调。

congratulate
celebrate

Let me congratulate you.请允许我向您表示祝贺。
May I congratulate you?请允许我向您表示祝贺。
I congratulate you on your great discovery.我祝贺你的伟大发现。

hover
falter,waver

The hawk is hovering overhead.鹰在头顶上盘旋。
After the alien spacecraft had hovered over the park for a short time, it vanished.那只外星来的宇宙飞船在公园上空盘旋了一会儿之后就不见了。
He hovered nervously in the doorway.他在门口紧张地来回踱步。

proclaim
declare,announce,broadcast,pronounce,state

The president proclaimed that a new currency would be issued.总统宣布将发行新货币。
She did not proclaim her intention.她没有把自己的意图明说出来。
He was impelled to proclaim his doctrine.他不得不宣扬他的教义。

ceiling
top,roof,maximum,topside,dome
floor
He cracked his nut on the ceiling.他的头让天花板碰破了。
The low ceiling of the room gave me a feeling of oppression.低矮的屋顶给我一种压抑的感觉。
It took more or less a whole day to paint the ceiling.粉刷天花板用了将近一整天的时间。

vulnerable
susceptible,defenseless,exposed,sensitive,open
invulnerable
Achilles was vulnerable only in his heel.阿基里斯只有脚后跟会受伤害。
The potato is vulnerable to several pests.马铃薯易受几种害虫的侵害。
Young birds are very vulnerable to predators.幼小的鸟易受食肉动物伤害。

severe
firm,stern,strict
tender
The premier came under severe criticism.这位总理遭到严厉的抨击。
He's suffering from severe mental disorder.他患有严重的精神病。
A severe storm turned the small village down to ground.一场剧烈的风暴把小村夷为平地。

virtue
goodness,integrity,honesty,quality,righteousness

Fidelity to engagement is a virtue.信守诺言是一种美德。
My neighbor is a man of highest virtue.我的邻居是一个具有高尚品德的人。
He said his plan had the virtue of being the easiest to implement.他说他的计划的优点是最简单易行。

breast
chest

The little baby can take nourishment from the breast.小婴儿可以从乳房中吸取营养。
The baby was being nursed at its mother's breast.那个孩子正在吃母亲的奶。
The bird's breast is flecked with brown.这只鸟胸前有棕色斑点。
